jot.physics.fluids.eulerian

Class PracticalFluids2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.fluids.eulerian.AbstractEulerianFluidSolver2D
      • jot.physics.fluids.eulerian.PracticalFluids2D

  • public class PracticalFluids2D
extends AbstractEulerianFluidSolver2D
    Port of Kaboom fluid simulator from intel http://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/multi-threaded-fluid-simulation-for-games based on Mick West 2006 style fluid solver. http://mickwest.com/
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • pressure_acc

        public float pressure_acc
        Pressure acceleration. Larger values (>10) are more realistic (like water) values that are too large lead to chaotic waves.

      • vorticity
